::GoldenEye:;

She watched as Dollen ate his dinner.  She was please that he liked 
what she had caught for him.  She looked up into the sky for a 
while.  She could see the night creatures flying about. The bats and 
the owls and such.  She leaned against a tree and looked at Dollen.
"I'm glad you like it. I can catch more in the morning for you.  They 
don't come out at night." She put her hands behind her head and 
leaned back against the tree.  She looked up at the stars and sighed.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>           Dollen looked at his food.  He transformed to taranturtle 
mode.
> He skuttled around on his legs.  Then he went up to his food.  He 
rubbed his
> two front legs together and said, "Dinner is served!!!!!  
Hehehehehe!!!" He
> cackled, sounding very much like Tarantulas.  He bit a big chunk 
out of the
> gopher meat with his two spider mandibles, and then another bit 
with his
> turtle jaws.
> 
>      "Hmmmm, tasty!!" He said as he transformed and took another 
bite of the
> meat.  He finished his meat, and then looked at GoldenEye.
> 
>          "You're quite the hunter, yes," He said, sounding very 
much like
> Megatron.
> 
> (OOC: When I say Dollen sounds very much like Tarantulas and 
Megatron, I
> don't mean he sounds exactly like their voice, he just sounds like 
them in
> speaking style in his own voice)
